","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Since the 2013 Open Hardware Summit at MIT, Addie Wagenknecht has chaired the Summit and served on the board of the organization.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Join us with a keynote from Allison Parrish before diving in to a full day of talks from incredible ohsw community members. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learn about the lessons from Linus and Google from Jason Kridner, open source hardware at Intel with Tracey Erway, Dan Seal on open hardware in education, Rianne Trujillo's work on getting open source hardware in national parks. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Not to mention 17 more speakers who have incredible stories and work to share! ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
